name: 'King of the Hill' - Joseph and Nancy Multiple Choice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions
tags: 'King Of The Hill' - Characters and Actors

questions.text: The beautiful Nancy Gribble is the unlikely wife of the paranoid Dale Gribble (How'd that happen?!), and the proud mother of Joseph.  What is the name of the actress who voices this lovely 'King of the Hill' character?
questions.explanation:
Ashley Gardner.

	Ashley Gardner is primarily a stage actress, although she has appeared in such movies as 'He Said, She Said' and 'Johnny Suede'.  She has made numerous appearances on television, on such shows as 'Seinfeld', 'Nash Bridges' and 'ER', but by far her best TV gig has been 'King of the Hill'.  In the early years of the show she voiced several of the female characters in each episode.  She also is the voice of Didi Hill.

questions.text: What type of employment has Nancy been involved in since the inception of the show?
questions.explanation:
Television news.

	Nancy started as a weather girl for Channel 84 News.  She then moved 'up' to become the co-anchor for that daily news show.  She goes by the 'stage' name Nancy Hicks-Gribble when she appears on television.

questions.text: Nancy Gribble hasn't always been a Gribble.  What was her birth surname?
questions.explanation:
Hicks.

	As mentioned in the previous information, she is proud of her birth name and continues to use it in a hyphenated sense professionally.  Here's another tidbit I'll bet you didn't know about Nancy: She's not a natural blonde!

questions.text: For many years, Nancy seemed to be quite fond of John Redcorn's 'treatments', and saw him regularly for his healing abilities.  For what ailment did John Redcorn regularly see Nancy?
questions.explanation:
Headaches.

	Whenever Nancy would suffer from one of her chronic 'headaches', which occurred about three times a week for 14 years, John Redcorn would be there to apply one of his miraculous treatments.  Or so was Dale told.  In reality, the two of them were carrying on a sordid affair.  Everyone in the neighborhood knew about it except for Dale and Peggy Hill (who learned about it much later than the rest of her friends).

questions.text: By what single word does Nancy refer to just about everyone she knows?
questions.explanation:
Shug.

	'Shug', short for 'sugar', is Nancy's pet name of choice.  Personally, I find this to be one of her most endearing qualities, it's a very sweet pet name.  The best thing about Nancy is that she is sweet, but a tough woman when she has to be!

questions.text: During the run of the show, Joseph goes through obvious physical changes, essentially the onset of puberty.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Indeed, Joseph is one of the few characters on the show who has manifested an obvious physical change from the early episodes to the later ones.  He has hit his growth spurt, growing several inches, his voice has changed and he has grown facial hair.

questions.text: Joseph has been voiced by not one, but two different voice actors.  The first was Brittney Murphy, but who was the second?
questions.explanation:
Breckin Meyer.

	Brittney Murphy, who also does the voice of Luanne, was the voice talent behind Joseph for the first four seasons.  Breckin Meyer began voicing Joseph in season five of the series.  He has appeared in many films, including: 'Go', 'The Insider' and 'The Craft'.

questions.text: Though Joseph is ostensibly the child of Nancy and Dale, John Redcorn is actually his true father.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Everyone clearly understands this fact except for poor Dale, who is woefully oblivious.  John Redcorn is proud of his son, despite the knowledge of his misdeeds with his friend Dale's wife.  He tries to instill Native American values into Joseph, with varying results.

questions.text: Joseph is perhaps Bobby Hill's best friend.  Together with Bobby, Joseph attends a middle school in Arlen with what name?
questions.explanation:
Tom Landry.

	Tom Landry Middle School, named for the greatest coach in the history of the Dallas Cowboys, has been the scholastic home of Bobby and Joseph for the entire run of the series.  Joseph does not seem to be a terribly bright student, but he has exhibited a high degree of athletic prowess.

questions.text: Joseph is very interested in girls, but is rather shy when it comes to actually meeting them.  With which woman from the show is Joseph especially infatuated?
questions.explanation:
Luanne.

	There are several episodes in which Joseph shows his special interest in Luanne, none more so than in one episode when he gets a peek of Luanne in the Hill bathroom after a shower.  Joseph has also had encounters with Connie, and the two of them have even kissed! Thanks for playing this quiz, I hope you have enjoyed it!
